programme.title: Fighting for Love - EP 6
programme.desc: The story follows A Mai, a female general of the founding era of the Southern Xia dynasty, who discards her feminine attire and dons battle armor, enduring hardships to become a legendary female warrior. Years later, A Mai, now a young woman, disguises herself as a man and roams the martial world, seeking revenge against Chen Qi.

They had three sons - Dadi (Adrian Pang), Dashan (San Yow) and Daqiu (Cavin Soh). Zhou Dong disappeared after a kidnap attempt went awry; not even his body was found.

programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her familys happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: Ranjani
programme.desc: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: Malar - Serial
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malar's ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner & a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destiny's plan for them?

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 6

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 9

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 18

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 29
programme.desc: From his humble beginnings at Queen's Park in Scotland to becoming a key player for Liverpool, Andy Robertson's rise is a tale of resilience, hard work, and determination. We delve in to his early struggles, his breakthrough at Hull City, and his crucial role in Liverpool's historic Premier League and Champions League triumphs.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 10
programme.desc: Michael Owen burst onto the scene for Liverpool at just seventeen years of age, and in two consecutive seasons the teenage sensation won the Premier League Golden Boot. Owen recalls those campaigns for the Reds, reliving the key moments that helped him develop into one of the greatest players of his generation.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 30
programme.desc: We explore the remarkable impact of the Basque region on the Premier League, focusing on the careers of the four current Basque managers who are leaving their mark in England's topflight. From tactical brilliance to relentless passion, this program delves into why the Basque Country has produced such a high number of successful managers and how their unique style has left a lasting legacy in the Premier League.

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs Brentford (MW18) - EP 179
programme.desc: Brentford have won fewer points away from home than any other Premier League side this season (1), while across 2024 as a whole, only Everton (10) have fewer points than the Bees (11, excluding promoted/relegated sides).

programme.title: FS MMA Mariusz Pudzianowski vs. Pawel Mikolajuw
programme.desc: This episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA showcases action from KSW 37 in Krakow Poland, highlighted by a Heavyweight showdown between hard-punching Mariusz Puszianowski taking on the 'Popek Monster' Pawel Mikolajuw. Both fighters weigh in at over 250 lbs. and can end the fight at any moment. It's Pudzianowski vs. Mikolajuw, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Ward vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features light heavyweights Andre 'S.O.G.' Ward (25-0, 13 KOs) vs. Chad Dawson (31-1, 17 KOs) in a championship contest from the Oracle Arena in Oakland, California, USA, on September 8, 2012. A paid attendance of 7,611 brought in a gate of $706,469 and 1.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Adrien Broner taking on Martin Rodriguez to determine the new WBO super featherweight world champion. With both fighters looking for their first major world championship, one left hook will bring about a new champion. Also on the card, action from multi-weight champion Paul Williams and Verno Phillips.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Endo, Abi, Meisei and Chiyonokuni from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights 'Sugar' Shane Mosley (43-4, 37 KOs) and Luis Collazo (27-2, 13 KOs) fighting over the interim WBC title. This fight took place at the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA, on February 10, 2007.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Zagreb Grand Prix, where some of the young Judo fans get the opportunity to train with former Olympic champion Mark Huizinga and triple world champion Illias Iliadis. Plus we watch as Judo's biggest star Teddy Riner competes in the +100 kg division.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Chris Arreola vs. Tomasz Adamek
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavyweight collision between Chris Arreola and Tomasz Adamek in a battle of one-loss competitors. Also on the card, Rocky Jearez takes on Jorge Barrios before a gruesome cut calls an end to the fight.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Endy Semeleer vs Redouan Laarkoubi
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 51

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 - EP 51
programme.desc: Lotor returns to put an end to things once and for all

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S1 - EP 25

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 75
programme.desc: Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 76
programme.desc: Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 49
programme.desc: It's a play date afternoon in Toy Green and everyone is there having fun. Noddy has got a new ball for Bumpy to replace his old one that went missing. But when he finds the new ball burst in his secret cupboard he decides to investigate. without letting Bumpy know what's happened. With Big Ears helping out by keeping Bumpy busy, Noddy and Revs are investigating against the clock to find out who burst the ball.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 50
programme.desc: The fairies are giving a big fairy flying display in Toyland. Fairy Coco is devastated when her wings disappear just before the Flying Display. Queen Sparklewings tells Noddy that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and if anybody else tries to use them it would be dangerous as they may fall and hurt themselves. Noddy immediately stars to investigate. Following all the clues, he works out that Smartysaurus found the wings after Fairy Coco took them off in the Fairy Garden.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 49
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Mole didn't live underground. She had tiny weenie ears where every little sound made her ears hurt. Unfortunately Tinga Tinga could be a very noisy place. Then one night when Elephant's snoring, Jackal's howling and Owl's twit-twooing get too much Mole decides to DIG. She digs and she digs and she digs.... until she finds total quiet. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 50
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Squirrel didn't gather nuts; she was far too busy braiding her bushy tail. Then one day there is very little food in Tinga Tinga and Lion summons all the animals to pull together and help find food for everyone. Squirrel is too busy braiding her tail to join in, but when she finally realises that there is not enough food to go round she races around gathering nuts for all the animals. The thing is she can't stop! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 49
programme.desc: Murray Walker is visiting Silver Hatch. Mr Carburettor would like him to commentate while the cars put on a stunt display. But Murray has other ideas he admits he has always dreamed of racing himself. An unlikely candidate makes his dreams come true!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 50
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor's cousin Chubby is coming to Silver hatch as he wants to film his new blockbuster there. Everybody goes all out to prove that it is just the right location for Chubby's new film

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: Today is Yarn Ball Day, a special day in the cat-filled town of Meowbuquerque. Unfortunately, the bridge leading to the party is broken. With time ticking, Tag, Scooch, and Kit work together at getting the cats across to the party. / When The Barkapellas announce that theyre cancelling their biggest concert ever, Tag is determined to figure out why in order to get them back on stage. But with a stadium full of impatient fans, Tag is going to have to work fast.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - EP 1
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvins time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didnt work quite how theyd hoped.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 52
programme.desc: Farmer Tom is having a Farm Fair at the Animal Acres Farm but it looks set to be ruined by an unexpected shower of carrots, cabbages and then pumpkins. Noddy and Deltoid investigate and discover the raining vegetables are caused by Smartysaurus, who is trying to find something heavy enough to go on the other end of her see-saw. She didn't realise that every time she sat on one end of the see-saw, she was sending the vegetables on the other end flying up into the air.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 51
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Meerkat was not always on the lookout. Meerkat used to race around Tinga Tinga bumping into things and causing chaos. programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 52

Every year Cheetah and Wind would race to see who was the fastest and every year Cheetah would win. Until one day.... Tales from Africa.

programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: The Bears switch bedrooms for the night and get a glimpse of the living space of one of their brothers. But as they go deeper, hidden secrets are revealed.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: To recover a missing package, the Bears get help from Ranger Tabes, an eccentric forest ranger. But her overblown sense of justice might be too much for the Bears to handle.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated, Ice Bear leaves his brothers to be the chef of a restaurant. Desperate to fill the void, Grizz and Panda look for Ice Bear's replacement.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Fed up with sharing, Panda forbids his brothers from using his cellphone any longer. But when the brothers get their own super-advanced smartphones, Panda starts to succumb to crippling jealousy.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: To abide by the clothing policy of their favourite Boba shop, the Bears get some new outfits. But with new looks come new lives - including office work, fashion modeling, and even falling in love!

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: While trying to sail to Japan, the Baby Bears get stranded on an island. Luckily, they meet Dave and Karla, who help with survival on the island, while looking for an escape.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Bears become terribly ill and Chloe takes it upon herself to take care of them. But things get tricky when word of the Bears' sickness goes viral.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: The Baby Bears have an adventure in the sky, on a plane to Sweden. But when the Baby Bears are forced to sit in different sections of the plane, things go haywire for everyone on board.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: The Bears are reunited with their pet crab, Captain Craboo. But after an unfortunate run-in with Nom Nom, the Bears may lose their pet forever.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 15
programme.desc: Panda needs to meet his brothers at the most exclusive restaurant in town. But when he loses his contact lenses and can't see, Panda needs Charlie's help to get him into the city.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 16
programme.desc: Ice Bear rides his custom vacuum into the city. But when a gang of techies steals the vacuum, Ice Bear goes on a rescue mission that takes him through the underground world of the city.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 17
programme.desc: The Bears audition to be the next mascot for their favourite cereal. They get so caught up in the process that their competitiveness gets the better of them.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 18
programme.desc: Ranger Tabes tells the Bears she's been investigating a mysterious creature. But when the Bears realise she's actually investigating their friend, Charlie, they split up to ensure Charlie's safety.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 19
programme.desc: Through a standard video-browsing session online, we get a glimpse of the different kinds of videos the Bears have posted.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 20
programme.desc: The Bears find Chloe in the library, exhausted from studying for an exam all day. The Bears stay to help Chloe study, but make things worse in the process.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 21
programme.desc: When his brothers don't need his help for the day, Grizz leaves the cave to assist anyone he can throughout the city.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 22
programme.desc: Panda uses an app to find a friend with whom he has more in common. Soon things take a turn for the worse when the new friend gets too possessive.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Baby Ice Bear lives alone in the Arctic and meets a mysterious man named Yuri. Together they help each other survive the cold environment.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 24
programme.desc: The Bears have been invited to all their friends' Christmas parties. To leave time to crash Nom Nom's huge star-studded bash, the Bears make quick stops at their friends' parties throughout the night.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: Money Movers' provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of days early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. 'Money Movers' anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBCs 'The Exchange' is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, 'Power Lunch' delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, 'Closing Bell' guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. 'Closing Bell: Overtime' takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Sustainable Future
programme.desc: Sustainable Future is CNBC's umbrella franchise to house explorations and discussions on the most important issue of our time; sustainability. In 30 minute episodes the worlds most knowledgeable, passionate and powerful people explore what needs to be done to make sure we all have a Sustainable Future.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBCs flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Asia Street Signs
programme.desc: Anchored by Tanvir Gill at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Street Signs" follows the day's biggest moves to provide CNBC's audience with actionable, real-time insights. From the anchor desk to trading desks around the region, "Street Signs" helps viewers capitalize on the plays of the day.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: CNBCs Christine Tan has been talking to the people who are shaping, governing and leading the Asia Pacific region for over twenty years in this ground-breaking show.

programme.title: Managing Asia

programme.title: American Greed S1-15
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victim's lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of.

programme.title: Us Fast Money (recorded) 2024
programme.desc: Fast Money' is Americas post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, 'Fast Money' breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: First Class
programme.desc: CNBC takes you on a journey that only a select few get to experience. CNBCs 'First Class' is the luxury travel destination that explores how billionaires see a city. From presidential suites and chefs tables in Michelin starred restaurants to personalized shopping and closed-off museums.

programme.title: Inside Track: The Business Of Formula 1
programme.desc: Formula 1 is the worlds most elite motorsports league with 10 teams, 20 drivers and races that span the globe. CNBC follows the money to find out what fuels its rapid growth and popularity.

programme.title: Macao Outdoor Performance Venue Warm-up Party @23:30
programme.desc: TVB Jade brings you endless entertainment with concurrent dramas and sitcoms, as well as the latest news, variety and infotainment programmes from TVB.

programme.title: The Legend of Heroes - EP 5
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yong's novel, based on the storyline from 'The Legend of the Condor Heroes', this five-part series include units 'Evil in the East, Poison in the West', 'Southern King and Northern Beggar', 'Sword Talk in Huashan', 'Nine Yin Manual' and 'Heart of Iron and Blood'.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 8
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Hilarious Family - EP 19
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1851
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Big Biz Duel - EP 3
programme.desc: Chairman Chiu Hai (Moses Chan) of Saidoi Logistics adheres to a people-first philosophy. With the support of his ex-wife Sand partner, he drives the company's return to the stock market. However, as capital forces become involved, hidden tensions rise.

programme.title: Are You The One - EP 33
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Forensic JD - EP 8

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption - EP 24
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Good Partner - EP 7
programme.desc: The story follows popular divorce lawyer Cha Eun-Kyung (Jang Na-ra), who finds herself faced with her own marital crisis. She often clashes with rookie lawyer Han Yoo-Ri (Nam Ji-Hyun) over cases. A workplace battle between the two lawyers is about to unfold.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 3
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: ICAC Investigators 2024 - EP 4
programme.desc: The brand-new series ICAC Investigators 2024 continues to educate the public about the dangers of corruption, while also showcasing the indomitable and fearless spirit of the anti-corruption staff.

programme.title: See Her Again - EP 1
programme.desc: A 90s Hong Kong's Serious Crimes Unit officer Yeung Kwong Yiu (William Chan) unexpectedly finds himself in 2018, where he meets his same-aged partner, Chan Hoi Ching (Cya Liu). They follow a series of elusive clues to investigate a long-unsolved serial murder.

programme.title: See Her Again - EP 2
programme.desc: A 90s Hong Kong's Serious Crimes Unit officer Yeung Kwong Yiu (William Chan) unexpectedly finds himself in 2018, where he meets his same-aged partner, Chan Hoi Ching (Cya Liu). They follow a series of elusive clues to investigate a long-unsolved serial murder.

programme.desc: The story follows popular divorce lawyer Cha Eun-Kyung (Jang Na-ra), who finds herself faced with her own marital crisis. She often clashes with rookie lawyer Han Yoo-Ri (Nam Ji-Hyun) over cases. A workplace battle between the two lawyers is about to unfold.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 4

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 19
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 19
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-heis boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Seventh Day, The - EP 5
programme.desc: The tale begins on the seventh of August, when WING and YAN first encounter their own dream girl on the island. WING works as a lifeguard on the outlying island. He gets to know pet shop assistant LING KA-YAN (CHOW LAI KI, NIKI) by chance and is soon mesmerized by her endearing personality. YAN who works at a coffee shop meets a romance comic artist called WONG CHI-KWAN (TONG SZE WING, NATALIE). Being misled into believing that the girl is from a rich family, YAN decides to chase her.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 11
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 12

He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 20
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 20
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-heis boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Seventh Day, The - EP 6
programme.desc: The tale begins on the seventh of August, when WING and YAN first encounter their own dream girl on the island. WING works as a lifeguard on the outlying island. He gets to know pet shop assistant LING KA-YAN (CHOW LAI KI, NIKI) by chance and is soon mesmerized by her endearing personality. YAN who works at a coffee shop meets a romance comic artist called WONG CHI-KWAN (TONG SZE WING, NATALIE). Being misled into believing that the girl is from a rich family, YAN decides to chase her.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 13
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

YAN who works at a coffee shop meets a romance comic artist called WONG CHI-KWAN (TONG SZE WING, NATALIE). Being misled into believing that the girl is from a rich family, YAN decides to chase her.

He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 77
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 20
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mothers pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 27
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 28
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 35
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 36
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Anna in Kungfu-Land
programme.desc: An advertising executive, Kin, launches a martial arts tournament as an advertising campaign for his client. He travels to Japan to invite Shaolin descendant, Anna, to join the tournament. This results in attracting the eccentric masters of other eight sects to join too. As the tournament approaches, Kin and Anna unconsciously fall for each other...

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: My Dream Girl
programme.desc: Tycoon Cheung is back in China after being abroad for five years and finds his long-lost daughter, Ling, in a poor village. To transform his unrefined and dirty daughter into a lady, Cheung hires Joe as Ling's image consultant.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai's most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Feel 100% 2003
programme.desc: Based on the popular comic book of the same name, Jerry and Lok are two best buddies with a common goal of finding their perfect girlfriend. Neither of them has ever encountered anything close to their "100% girl", until they meet the fabulous Cherie. The two decide to compete for her affections, but who will succeed?

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: One Nite in Mongkok
programme.desc: A mainland hitman Loy is hired to avenge the death of a gangster's son but the police are onto him from the start. While hiding in the dense streets of Mongkok, Loy saves a call girl Dan Dan from some gangsters. Loy and Dan Dan are hunted around Mongkok by police and gangsters. Who wiIl find them first, the lawful force or the lawless one?

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Flash Point
programme.desc: Sergeant Ma Jun is a hot-headed cop who vows to take down three powerful triad drug dealing brothers. His fellow officer, Wilson, is an experienced undercover agent working within the triad gang. They both agree to a partnership, but when Wilson's cover is blown, Jun is forced to confront the gang with the only way he knows - his fists.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Long's wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident...

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the "speed gang", led by Johnny, and Kuo's sister Carrie is molested by Johnny's brother Michael. Kuo's family continues to be harassed by the "speed gang" while on the island - can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas' pursuit.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this "young" auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies' youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case...

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper's daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother's death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiao's fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Life is A Long Quiet River - EP 18
programme.desc: The story centers Feng Xiaoqin and Gu Qingyu, two sisters-in-law who work through their differences and grow closer in life. Faced with strong pursuit from Zhao Xiang and the reappearance of her childhood sweet heart Shi Yuan, Qingyu is entangled.

programme.title: Time Concert 2024 - EP 4
programme.desc: After 20 years, the Girls are back on stage! "Time Concert 2024" revives nostalgic melodies, celebrating two decades of music with a dazzling showcase and a competition for the top hits of the era!

programme.title: Road Home - EP 23
programme.desc: This drama tells the story of an investment director Gui Xiao (Tan Song Yun) who reunites with his first love who is now a bomb tech police officer Lu Yan Chen (Jing Bo Ran) after ten years. The two of them hit it off and find their way back to loyalty and faith.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 147
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Life is A Long Quiet River - EP 19
programme.desc: The story centers Feng Xiaoqin and Gu Qingyu, two sisters-in-law who work through their differences and grow closer in life. Faced with strong pursuit from Zhao Xiang and the reappearance of her childhood sweet heart Shi Yuan, Qingyu is entangled.

programme.title: Missing: The Other Side 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: 3 Gongdan is a village where the souls of missing deceased people gather. Meanwhile, the protagonists in the drama try to find the bodies of the missing and figure out the truth.
